name: Survive Or Escape
description:
This is a short experience based of an idea of a full game i'd like to continue working on.

This is the story of Alex a downtrodden and unlucky guy thats got no other choice to play The Hunter's game or face the consequences.

Will you discover the secrets and find your way out the manor?

Controls : 
Arrow Keys - Movement 
Z - Action Key
X - Cancel
Sprint - Shift
